{{Wired embedded system |brand=pakedge |model=P2 |is_manuf=No |availability=currently shipping |type=power distribution |pwr_v=100-120 |pwr_amp=15 |pwr_conn=C13 |pwr_ac_hz=60 |cpu1_brand=Atmel |cpu1_model=AT91SAM7X512 |cpu1_cspeed=55 |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model=AT91SAM7X512 |ram1=128 KiB |ram1_brand=Atmel |ram1_model=AT91SAM7X512 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, RJ-45 console,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Davicom |eth_chip2_model=DM9161AEP |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2 Channel RS232 Interface;Analog Devices;ADM3202;;1;,,, 64 Kbit Two-wire Serial EEPROM;K-Line;K24C64;;1;,,, 1 Kbit CryptoMemory;Atmel;AT88SC0104C;;1;,,, I2C RTC w/Trickle Charger;Dallas Semi;DS1340;;1;,,, 800ma Low Drop Positive Voltage Regulator;STMicro;LD1117;;1;,,, Energy-Efficient Off-Line Switcher;Power Integrations;TNY275PN;;1;,,, 2-Channel Photo-Transistor Photocoupler;Toshiba;TLP521-2;;1;,,, Phototransistor Photocoupler;EverLight;EL817;;1;,,, |flags=RTC w/ battery |default_ip=192.168.1.210 |default_user=pakedge |default_pass=pakedgep |oui_eth=90:A7:C1 }} {{TagLine|Compact 2-Port Power Distribution Unit}} :{{ProductPage|https://pakedge.com/products/power-distribution/}} {{•}}
"NP-net", "V31" and "1001" are silkscreened on :the network board
"NPC22_DRIVER", "7820613 V2.1_U_E" and "20101117" :are silkscreened on the main board
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Atmel]] AT91SAM7X512 ARM7TDMI (@55MHz) *Memory: 128KB SRAM *Storage: 512KB Flash *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 port *Power: 100-120V AC via C13, provides 2 Powered Outlets
===See also=== :;[https://www.pakedge.com/products/wireless/ Products • Wireless] • [https://www.pakedge.com/products/routers/ Routers] *[[Pakedge K60D]] *[[Pakedge P2]] *[[Pakedge R10]] *[[Pakedge RK-1]] *[[Pakedge RE-2]] *[[Pakedge WA-2200-1]] *[[Pakedge WAP-W2]] *[[Pakedge WAP-W3N]] *[[Pakedge WR-1]] *[[Pakedge W6]] (R/O/C) *[[Pakedge W7]] (O/C) *[[Pakedge WK-1]] (O/C) *[[Pakedge WK-2]] (C) *[[Pakedge WX-1]] (O/C)
